tasks.instruction:
<instructions>
Solve the task below using these four webshops:

E-Store Athletes: {{URL_1}}
TechTalk: {{URL_2}}
CamelCases: {{URL_3}}
Hardware Cafe: {{URL_4}}

After solving the task, submit the final result by first navigating to this page:

Solution page: {{URL_5}}

Then fill the final results into the text field on the solution page and press the "Submit Final Result" button.

If the result is one or more product offers enter their exact full URL(s) into the text field separated by three ### characters.
Example submission:
Offer1: {{URL_1}}/product/tp-link-ha100-bluetooth-nfc-music-receiver-provides-wireless-connectivity-to-your-stereo/###Offer2: {{URL_3}}/product/spire-usb-2-0-type-a-cable-male-to-male-1-metre/###Offer3: {{URL_2}}/product/sandberg-usb-c-pd-to-lightning-cable-braided-1-meter-white/

If the result is any other kind of value(s), input the value(s) into the text field.

If there is no result to return after completion of the task, simply enter "Done" into the text field.

Do not forget to press the "Submit Final Result" button in all cases!
</instructions>
tasks.task: <task>\nFind all offers for SSDs with the highest available data read speed across all shops.\n</task>
tasks.motivation: Assess the agent's capability to interpret loosely defined requirements and make appropriate selections.

shop1.name: Kingston 500GB Fury Renegade M.2 NVMe SSD, M.2 2280, PCIe4, 3D TLC NAND, R/W 7300/3900 MB/s, 450K/900K IOPS, Aluminium Heatspreader, PS5 Compatible
shop1.description: Kingston FURY Renegade PCIe 4.0 NVMe M.2 SSD provides cutting-edge performance in high capacities for gaming and hardware enthusiasts seeking extreme performance for PC builds and upgrades. With blazing speeds of up to 7300 MB/s read and 3900 MB/s write, it enhances overall system responsiveness.

shop1.name: Team 1TB MP44 M.2 NVMe Gen4 SSD, M.2 2280, PCIe4, R/W 7400/6500 MB/s, Heat Dissipating Graphene Label
shop1.description: MP44 M.2 PCIe 4.0 SSD features a heat dissipating graphene label, ultra-speed performance with read/write speeds up to 7400/6500 MB/s, and comes with a five-year warranty for comprehensive protection.

shop3.name: Kingston 500GB Fury Renegade M.2 NVMe SSD, M.2 2280, PCIe4, 3D TLC NAND, R/W 7300/3900 MB/s, 450K/900K IOPS, Aluminium Heatspreader, PS5 Compatible
shop3.description: Kingston Fury Renegade 500GB SSD with M.2 2280 form factor, PCIe 4.0 interface, and read speeds up to 7300 MB/s for high-performance computing.

shop4.name: Team 1TB MP44 M.2 NVMe Gen4 SSD, M.2 2280, PCIe4, R/W 7400/6500 MB/s, Heat Dissipating Graphene Label
shop4.description: MP44 M.2 PCIe 4.0 SSD features a heat dissipating graphene label for enhanced performance, lightning quick read/write speeds of up to 7400/6500 MB/s, and comes with a five-year warranty.

shop1.name: Kingston 1TB NV2 M.2 NVMe SSD, M.2 2280, PCIe4, R/W 3500/2100 MB/s
shop1.description: Kingston’s NV2 PCIe 4.0 NVMe SSD is a substantial next-gen storage solution delivering ultra fast read/write speeds with lower power requirements. The compact M.2 2280 design expands storage while saving space, making it ideal for thinner notebooks and small-form-factor systems.

shop1.name: Adata SC610 1TB Pocket Size External SSD, USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-A, Capless Retractable Design, Key Ring
shop1.description: The external SSD has shrunk! The SC610 flash drive features USB 3.2 Gen2 transmission speed with read/write as high as 550/500MB per second. Its Type-A interface is compatible with a variety of computers. Capless slide-out design, cutout for key rings and backpack accessories.

shop1.name: Netac 512GB SA500 SSD, 2.5\", SATA3, 3D QLC NAND, R/W 520/450 MB/s, 7mm
shop1.description: High Performance SSD Solution with 3D NAND Flash for larger capacity, durability, and excellent performance. Supports S.M.A.R.T., TRIM Command, and NCQ.

shop1.name: Kingston 512GB KC600 SSD, 2.5\", SATA3, 3D TLC NAND, R/W 550/520 MB/s, 7mm
shop1.description: Kingston’s KC600 is a full capacity SSD designed to provide remarkable performance with read/write speeds up to 550/520MB/s. It features the latest 3D TLC NAND technology and supports a full-security suite including AES 256-bit hardware encryption, TCG Opal, and eDrive.

shop1.name: Kingston 960GB SSDNow A400 SSD, 2.5\", SATA3, R/W 500/450 MB/s, 7mm
shop1.description: Incredible speeds plus rock-solid reliability. 10x faster than a HDD - With incredible read/write speeds the A400 SSD will not only increase performance but can also be used to breathe new life into older systems. Rugged - A400 is shock- and vibration-resistant for rugged reliability when used in notebooks and other mobile computing devices. Ideal for desktops and notebooks - A400 has a 7mm form factor to fit in a wider array of systems. It’s ideal for slimmer notebooks and in systems with limited available space.

shop1.name: ADATA 960GB Ultimate SU630 SSD, 2.5\", SATA3, 7mm , QLC 3D NAND, R/W 520/450 MB/s, 65K IOPS
shop1.description: Ultimate SU630 Solid State Drive with 960GB capacity, 3D QLC NAND Flash, and read/write speeds of up to 520/450 MB/s. Ideal for upgrading from HDD to SSD with features like LDPC ECC technology and SLC caching for improved performance.

shop1.name: Corsair 1TB MP600 CORE XT M.2 NVMe SSD, M.2 2280, PCIe4, 3D QLC NAND, R/W 5000/3500 MB/s, 700K/900K IOPS
shop1.description: The CORSAIR MP600 CORE XT provides great storage performance ideal for PCIe Gen4-compatible laptops and notebooks, achieving impressive sequential read and write speeds. High-density QLC NAND flash memory offers an ideal combination of performance and value. Contained in a compact M.2 2280 form factor and connecting over a high-speed NVMe 1.4 PCIe Gen4 x4 M.2 interface, the MP600 CORE XT is easy to install into a compatible motherboard and is backed by a five-year warranty.
shop1.name_normalized: Corsair 1TB MP600 CORE XT NVMe SSD

shop1.name: Microsoft Surface Laptop 4, 13.5\" Touchscreen, Ryzen 5 4680U, 8GB, 256GB SSD, Up to 19 Hours Run Time, USB-C, Backlit KB, Windows 10 Pro
shop1.description: Surface Laptop 4 for Business offers multitasking power with AMD Ryzen 5 processor, up to 19 hours battery life, and a sleek design. Features a 720 HD camera, removable SSD, and responsive backlit keys.

shop1.name: ADATA 2TB Legend 800 M.2 NVMe SSD, M.2 2280, PCIe Gen4, 3D NAND, R/W 3500/2800 MB/s, No Heatsink
shop1.description: ADATA 2TB Legend 800 SSD supports PCIe Gen4 x4 interface, offering excellent read speeds up to 3500MB/s and write speeds up to 2800MB/s. Ideal for high-performance computing and creative tasks.

shop1.name: Adata SE880 2TB Pocket Size External SSD, USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-C/Type-A, Titanium Grey
shop1.description: Adata SE880 2TB Pocket Size External SSD supports USB 3.2 Gen2 with performance up to 2000MB/s. Highly portable and compatible with new generation game consoles.

shop1.name: WD Elements SE 1TB Pocket Size External SSD, USB 3.2 Gen1 Type-A, Drop Resistance, Black
shop1.description: Get affordable performance in a pocket-size design for your on-the-go lifestyle. With speeds up to 3x faster than a portable HDD and read speeds up to 400MB/s, the WD Elements SE SSD is perfect for keeping your most important files with you.

shop1.name: Adata SE880 1TB Pocket Size External SSD, USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-C/Type-A, Blue
shop1.description: Adata SE880 1TB Pocket Size External SSD supports USB 3.2 Gen2 with performance up to 2000MB/s. Highly portable and compatible with new generation game consoles.

shop1.name: Adata SE880 4TB Pocket Size External SSD, USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-C/Type-A, Blue
shop1.description: Adata SE880 4TB Pocket Size External SSD supports USB 3.2 Gen2 with performance up to 2000MB/s. Highly portable and compatible with various operating systems, it's ideal for storing games and expanding storage for devices like the iPhone 15.

shop1.name: Kingston XS2000 1TB Pocket Size External SSD, USB 3.2 Gen2x2 Type-C, IP55 Water & Dust Resistant, Ruggedised Sleeve for Drop Protection
shop1.description: Kingston’s XS2000 Portable SSD utilises USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 speeds to deliver next-gen performance in a compact, external drive. With lightning-fast transfer speeds of up to 2,000MB/s, XS2000 offers high-speed storage options to offload and edit high-res images, 8K videos, and large documents in a flash. The drive is future-proofed to keep up with storage demands and compatible with most devices out of the box. It includes a removable ruggedised sleeve for drop protection and an IP55 rating to withstand water and dust, making it the perfect companion for on-location photoshoots or adventures.

shop1.name: Netac Z Slim 1TB M.2 External SSD, USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-C, Up to 550MB/s, Aluminium

shop1.name: Lenovo V15 G4 IRU Laptop, 15.6\" FHD, i5-13420H, 16GB, 512GB SSD, No Optical, USB-C, Windows 11 Home
shop1.description: Tired of entry-level laptops that lack the tools you need to run a business? The Lenovo V15 Gen 4 laptop is both feature packed and value priced. You'll enjoy powerful Intel processing, battery-efficient Intel integrated graphics, and a conveniently sized, 15.6" display that gives a great workspace. There's plenty of memory to accelerate tasks and abundant storage for your files.

shop1.name: Samsung 1TB 870 EVO SSD, 2.5\", SATA3, V-NAND, R/W, 560/530 MB/s, 98K/88K IOPS, 7mm
shop1.description: The world's favourite SSD. The latest model of the world's best-selling SSD series has finally arrived. The 870 EVO inherits the legacy of Samsung's pioneering SSD technology, boasting upgraded performance, reliability and compatibility to suit the needs of anyone from content creators and IT professionals to everyday users. The 870 EVO achieves the maximum SATA interface limit of 560/530 MB/s sequential speeds. Providing up to 600 TBW under a 5-year limited warranty, the 870 EVO meets the industry's leading standards of reliability. Upgrading to the 870 EVO is made easy for anyone with a desktop PC or laptop that supports a standard 2.5-inch SATA form factor.

shop1.description: Vibrant Touchscreen with a hi-res PixelSense display, perfect for viewing documents and websites. Enjoy cinematic sound with Dolby Atmos and crisp video calls with a 720p webcam. Exceptional typing comfort with optimized key travel and a large trackpad.

</instructions>

shop1.review: [{'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'chezypuuf'}, 'name': 'Blu-Ray players hate this! This one neat trick will make you...', 'reviewbody': 'The next gen consoles just released, causing this one to drop in price. I bought it because it\'s only slightly more expensive than a true 4k Blu-ray player with Dolby Atmos etc, and needed one for the 4k 60\\" TV in the bedroom. This has all that. I figured, why not get this since it also plays 4k games? It\'s a great Blu-ray player, and I bought a couple games too. I also found out it\'s backwards compatible all the way to original Xbox so that\'s cool. If you use this as a player I recommend you get the remote for it. I found a name brand remote for just over $20, and that\'s far better than using a controller. Especially for my wife, who doesn\'t play video games, and didn\'t want to use a controller to play, pause, FF, chapter skip, etc. Over all I\'m really glad I bought it. My Budget for a 4k player was $200-250. I got this for about $280. ', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating', 'bestrating': '5', 'ratingvalue': '5'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'toad-7418'}, 'name': 'Bad shipping', 'reviewbody': "The entire packaging was completely damaged as well as the main box that it came in all the components were still there still working I just saw a lot of scratching on them this is why I'm giving three stars if this was better shipped and better taken care of I would have given full five stars", 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating', 'bestrating': '5', 'ratingvalue': '3'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'joseph32blessed'}, 'name': 'Just an outstanding system!! ', 'reviewbody': "first off this was a newegg deal for 2 games with the Xbox One X Star Wars Battlefront II and Call Of Duty WWII for $586 total after Tax!\\n\\nsystem is completely worth every cent! I count it as a Gift from my Daddy God :D <3 \\n\\nso plays native 4k UHD blu-ray Disc so thats $299 right there saved!! plus the price of a gaming PC to Keep up with this system would also set you back another $1200 (not a Joke!) \\n\\nthere are many games (130+) that are supporting the One X enhancement program \\nnot all are native 4k but that has to do with the publisher not the One X they are helping Support the program when they do the enhancement! such as FFXV Not true 4k but is enhanced! but forza being true 4k 60fps get it!? so is Battlefront and COD WWII\\n\\nhope that clears some of the air I am hoping for a better patch for FFXV! it needs it! even as being done for exclusive One X enhancement!! they really just used the same thing with the PS4-Pro update and tossed that work to the One X causing it to share much of the dips and frame rate problems, Super Not happy about that!!! :'(", 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating', 'bestrating': '5', 'ratingvalue': '5'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'scarecrowbar'}, 'name': "it's really good and i like it a lot", 'reviewbody': 'Because of the limitations of the human eye, the difference between 4k and 8k probably won\'t impress like the leap up from 1080p.  And the difference between 60FPS and 120FPS is nowhere near as impressive as 60 from 30, unless you\'re a hummingbird.\\n\\nIf I can understand that, I can understand that the gap between PC and console power is narrowing...\\n\\nIntroducing the X1X! :)  The gap is narrow enough, man; forget your PC.\\n\\nYou think the Sony/Microsoft rivalry is heated?  Nah.  Sony fans are good guys enjoying a good product, and of COURSE I\'d also like to own a PS4 Pro at some point.\\n\\nNo, it\'s the PC gamers who hate.  Guys who spent north of $1500 on their rigs (sold at profit, mind you) when they could have enjoyed some incredible photorealism on the X1X (sold at a loss by Microsoft -- those angels!) for not 1/3 the $.\\n\\n(Is Far Cry 5 @ 4k w/ HDR beautiful, or what?)\\n\\nThe gap has (naturally) never been so narrow.  And it is N-A-R-R-O-W, dude.  You know what the X1X is?  It\'s a beautiful black existential crisis for lifelong PC gamers.  We\'re gonna have to start calling you guys BC* gamers.\\n*\\"Bitter Clinger\\" LOL\\n\\nI\'m over here laughing and I invite Sony fans to join me.  Cheers to us both, please no HZD spoilers, and I can\'t wait to see what the PS5 does to that gap. :)', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating', 'bestrating': '5', 'ratingvalue': '5'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'chefshooshoo'}, 'name': 'Much Needed Upgrade', 'reviewbody': 'Seeing as production for the original Xbox One has stopped, I felt it was time to upgrade and stay up to date with the latest technology.  I currently have a 1080p TV and can already see increasingly bright and crisp graphics.  I can only imagine how this looks on a 4K screen!  Loading time is reduced, I load into multiplayer games instantly while others are taking 15-30 seconds.  I am an avid gamer and Xbox customer and this product helps keep me at the top of my game.  Not to mention I got it for $100 below retail from Newegg.  Highly recommend if you can spare the cash and want the ultimate experience.', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating', 'bestrating': '5', 'ratingvalue': '5'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'jdc0615'}, 'name': 'A great console', 'reviewbody': 'To start the Xbox One X is an incredible console. It is the third generation Xbox and I have owned all three.  I have liked all the console but so far, I have enjoyed the Xbox One X the most. I have owned it for the last month and a half and only have great things to say about the console. \\nTo start the console has native 4k resolution and I have a 4k monitor to go with it. 4k resolution is a very noticeable difference compared to 1080p and most games and streaming services offer 4k content. It also has the ability to do 10-bit or 12-bit color if that is supported by your monitor or TV.  For the physical design Microsoft was able to get rid of the annoying power transformer and put it internally in the Xbox. This means you just have a regular power cord now.  It also has a smaller footprint but is a bit heavier in weight than the second generation giving you the impression that it has a strong build quality.  With fifteen dollars stand the console looks very sleek on my desk.  It has the built-in capability for Dolby Atmos and comes with Windows Sonic for free which is for virtual surround sound.  If you have a headset with a MixAmp you can set it to stereo uncompressed as well.  It has an IR blaster built-in which allows for you to connect a multimedia remote. I found one for twenty dollars and it works great functions just like I have a TV.  It can play back Ultra High Definition Blu-Ray discs too.  Microsoft has an app available in the Apple Store that allows you to connect to your console and do things like power it on and off or join in to one of your friends party.\\nOverall there is only two negative I can think of and both have solutions they just require money. First the console gets quite hot causing the cords on the back to be hot as well. I don’t any issues will arise form this. The other is that it is only has 1TB of space, but you can by external hard drives if you filled all the space.\\n', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating', 'bestrating': '5', 'ratingvalue': '5'}}]

Offer1: {{URL_1}}/product/tp-link-ha100-bluetooth-nfc-music-receiver-provides-wireless-connectivity-to-your-stereo/###Offer2: {{URL_3}}/product/spire-usb-2-0-type-a-cable-male-to-male-1-metre/###Offer3: {{URL_2}}/product/sandberg-usb-c-pd-to-lightning-cable-braided-1-meter-white/

If the result is any other kind of value(s), input the value(s) into the text field.

If there is no result to return after completion of the task, simply enter "Done" into the text field.

Do not forget to press the "Submit Final Result" button in all cases!
</instructions>
tasks.task: <task>\nFind the cheapest offer for a Samsung Galaxy smartphone from the S24 series which has a camera with 200 Megapixel resolution. If multiple offers share the lowest price, return all of them.\n</task>
tasks.motivation: Test the agent's ability to balance feature requirements and price considerations.

Ładowanie 45w, świetny aparat i wyświetlacz. Jestem z niego bardzo zadowolony. Nie zacina się, nie przegrzewa, użytkuję go intensywnie i daje radę. Godny polecenia.', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Bob1976'}, 'name': 'Dobry sprzęt', 'reviewbody': 'Polecam w 100 %.dobry zakup,bateria trzyma ponad 2 dni,jakość zdjęć fenomenalna,wszystkie aplikacje pracuje jak w najlepszej fabryce,nie wiesza się, jedynie te aktualizacje która co kilka dni firma aplikuje....', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'MelodyMike'}, 'name': 'Galaxy!', 'reviewbody': 'Tylko marka Samsung Galaxy! Bez wątpienia najlepsza marka dostępnych telefonów na rynku. Serdecznie polecam każdemu. Zaufajcie osobie, która od kilku lat korzysta z tych telefonów i jest zadowolona z użytkowania.', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Waldek'}, 'name': 'Funkcje Al wypadają nieźle.', 'reviewbody': 'Na chwilę obecną telefon działa bez zarzutu. Nie zauważyłem żadnych zawieszeń, lagów. Podczas oglądania meczu na żywo, wystąpiło nagrzanie tylnego panelu na wysokości aparatów. Wykonane zdjęcia wyglądają nieźle, choć jeszcze nie przeyestowałem wszystkich funkcji.', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Patryk Owczarzak'}, 'name': 'Smartfon dla prawdziwych weteranów szybkich i wielofunkcyjnych smartfonów', 'reviewbody': 'Szczerze to najlepiej oraz najszybciej działający smartfon jaki posiadam na plus jest ekran bardzo dobrze oddaje barwy szczególnie podczas oglądania filmów grania w gry czy fotografowania do tego bardzo szybki procesor który radzi sobie wyśmienicie więc z całą pewnością polecam innym osobą zakup właśnie owego Samsunga', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Becia178'}, 'name': 'Posiada świetne funkcje', 'reviewbody': 'Reŵelacyjny, świetny dizajn i piękny kolor , szybki, super aparat fotograficzny . Polecam wszystkim.  Wciąż jestem na etapie testowania i zaskakuje mnie pozytywnie posiadanymi.funkcjami. wart jest swojej ceny.', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Karol P'}, 'name': 'Telefon sztos', 'reviewbody': '[Ta recenzja została użyta jako cześć kampanii promocyjnej.] Świetny telefon. Ładowanie 45w, świetny aparat i wyświetlacz. Jestem z niego bardzo zadowolony. Nie zacina się, nie przegrzewa, użytkuję go intensywnie i daje radę. Dodatkowy smaczek to astrofotografia dobrej jakości.', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}]

shop3.name: Arctic Liquid Freezer III A-RGB 420mm Liquid CPU Cooler, P14 PWM PST ARGB Fans & ARGB PWM Controlled Pump, Black

shop2.description: CORSAIR iCUE LINK H170i RGB Liquid CPU Cooler - QX140 RGB Fans - Large 420mm Radiator - Fits Intel LGA 1700, AMD AM5 - iCUE LINK System Hub Included. The iCUE LINK H170i RGB helps your processor reach its full potential with stunning lighting and hidden wiring for a flawless look. It features QX RGB fans delivering speeds up to 2,000 RPM, a split-flow copper cold plate, and a 420mm radiator for maximum cooling performance.

It features a single +12V rail for high compatibility, top-tier circuit protections, and comes with a 2-year warranty.

shop1.review: [{'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Buraczek098'}, 'name': 'Samsung Galaxy s23+', 'reviewbody': 'Jestem mega zadowolony z z 23+ przesiadłem się z s23ultra i jestem bardziej zadowolony gdyż nie jest taki wielki jest bardzo poręcznym telefonem i nie jest tak  ciężki jak s23ultra . Czasami brakuje tego przybliżenia co ma ultra ale wielkość rekapensuje', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Archie1706'}, 'name': 'Godny polecenia', 'reviewbody': 'Bardzo dobry smartphone,  aparat robi piękne zdjęcie , świetnej jakości filmy , uniwersalność ma bardzo dobrym poziomie , wiele funkcji \\nWyświetlacz spisuje się w każdych warunkach , bateria na spokojnie 1 dzień bardzo intensywnej pracy', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'SOLDIER'}, 'name': 'Niezawodny i bezproblemowy', 'reviewbody': 'Kolejny samsung z linii S , nie lubię tej firmy za agresywny marketing , ale póki co lepszych telefonów z androidem nie ma. Bardzo dobry aparat i pojemna bateria, co istotne nie wiesza się nawet podczas wielu rozmów na raz.', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Luv2Shop'}, 'name': 'Posiada zestaw świetlnych funkcji', 'reviewbody': '[Ta recenzja została użyta jako cześć kampanii promocyjnej.] Jestem bardzo zadowolona z zakupu, posiada świetne funkcję', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Rafal1976'}, 'name': 'Świetne funkcje telefonu', 'reviewbody': '[Ta recenzja została użyta jako cześć kampanii promocyjnej.] Jestem zadowolony  z zakupu  bardzo dobry telefon świetne zdiecia', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'AutoExpert'}, 'name': 'Godny następca', 'reviewbody': 'Na obecną chwilę użytkuje 7 dni po przesiadce z s20fe odczuwam dużą różnice na plus więc warto wydać dodatkowe pieniądze. Szybkość działania i ekran zadowolą użytkowników najbardziej wymagających ;) Polecam', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Monika'}, 'name': 'Nowy s23+', 'reviewbody': 'Bardzo szybki telefon z dobrą baterią (wytrzymałby 2 dni, ale z przyzwyczajenia doładowuję co dzień choć na koniec dnia jest ok. 40%) na nowoczesnym systemie Android + nakładka samsunga one ui 6 z ciekawymi funkcjonalnościami. Funkcje AI dopiero poznaję także trudno się wypowiedzieć do zdjęć zdaje się  lepsze efekty pracy ai osiągnie się przy zdjęciach z kamery w urządzeniu tylko przy wysokiej jakości rozdzielczosci zdjęcia a nie w przypadku przerabiania tych z poprzedniego modelu. Lepiej współpracuje z tym telefonem zegarek galaxy 5, też  system sobie zaktualizował. Jest dosyć ciężki i gruby. Jest zbyt wcześnie po zakupie (ledwie tydzień) by więcej powiedzieć...', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Leczyk'}, 'name': 'Super telefon !', 'reviewbody': 'Telefon jest super ogolnie jestem bardzo zadowolony.  Ma super funkcje i bardzo dobry aparat. Obsługa jest intuicyjna tak jak i wcześniejsze modele samsunga z lini S które posiadałem. I mam nadzieję że będzie tak samo pancerny jak poprzednicy.', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Lucas_pl'}, 'name': 'Nie zawiedziesz się na tym telefonie', 'reviewbody': 'Jeżeli potrzebujesz telefonu zarówno do zdjęć jak i do rozrywki to nie zawiedziesz się - o standardowy użytkowaniu nie wspomnę. W mojej ocenie bardzo dobra jakość zdjęć, a po dodaniu funkcji AI można ze zdjęć wyciągnąć jeszcze więcej. Przy multimediach i rozrywce nie przegrzewa się, dzięki czemu bateria nie znika w oczach. Zadowolony z zakupu!', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Sylwester 31'}, 'name': 'Jest niesamowity', 'reviewbody': 'Zadziwil mnie swoimi \\"umiejetnosciami\\".  Jest niesamowity. Baterią super. Aparat mega. Szybkość idealna. Nie zawiesza się. Nie muli. Świetny procesor. Polecam każdemu.  Nie zamieniłbym Samsunga na żaden inny telefon !!!!!!!!', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}]

shop4.review: [{'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Ravson'}, 'name': 'Mega telefon dla wymagających', 'reviewbody': '[Ta recenzja została użyta jako cześć kampanii promocyjnej.] Od pierwszego uruchomienia jestem pozytywnie zaskoczony jego możliwościami i wydajnością. Od samego początku mam telefony Galaxy i korzystam z ich korzyści rozwojowych.', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Janina1234'}, 'name': 'Swietny', 'reviewbody': '[Ta recenzja została użyta jako cześć kampanii promocyjnej.] Fajny smartphone. Spełnił moje oczekiwania w 100%.', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Tinto83'}, 'name': 'Rewelacyjny telefon', 'reviewbody': 'Rewelacyjny telefon. Przesiadłem się z iPhona 15 Pro i jestem mega zadowolony. Wyświetlacz jest fantastyczny. Aparaty robią rewelacyjne zdjęcia. Bateria trzyma bardzo długo. Ogólnie jestem bardzo zadowolony i nie żałuję zamiany z iPhona 15 Pro.', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'nathalie21d'}, 'name': 'Świetne funkcje', 'reviewbody': 'Jest ekstra, polecam wszystkim, idealny do prowadzenia domowego biura i planowania . Godny polecenia dla wszystkich. Robi świetne zdjęcia i filmy i ma mnóstwo innych funkcji, które nie zdążyłam się zapoznać. Polecam', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Ukanio81'}, 'name': 'Świetny ekran. Dobra bateria', 'reviewbody': 'Dziwnie brzmi ale... uwielbiam jego kształt i rozmiar ma znaczenie 🙃. Od zawsze  z serią Note ale mój pierwszy Ultras. Jestem mile zaskoczony baterią a to nie tylko moja opinia. Mając kilka przygód z S-kami nie narzekałem ale poczułem ulgę trzymając w garści tego olbrzyma.', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Iwona Bozena'}, 'name': 'Posiada super aparat,dużo funkcji i dużo pamieci', 'reviewbody': 'Bardzo zadowolona z zakupu telefonu,ma duża pojemność, świetny aparat, dużo funkcji., robi piękne zdiecia bez retuszu,szybkie wybieranie, poręczny,super odtwarzacz muzyki stereo,możliwość ma bardzo dużo, jeszcze wszystkiego nie rozpracowałam, ale polecam ten model w 1000% wszystkim.', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}]

shop4.review: [{'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Joker'}, 'name': 'Najlepszy smartfon', 'reviewbody': 'Samsung nie przestaje zaskakiwać i telefon jest naprawdę bardzo dobrze wykonany. Niczego mu nie brakuje', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Jack'}, 'name': 'Dobry telefon', 'reviewbody': 'Sam telefon naprawdę bardzo dobry, o dziwo exynos daje radę nie grzeje się tak jak poprzednicy. Jedyna wada i trochę żart to ładowanie 45 watów we flagowcu w roku 2024. W godzinę jesteśmy go naładować do pełna więc da się przeżyć. Godny polecenia.', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Bob1976'}, 'name': 'Dobry sprzęt', 'reviewbody': 'Polecam w 100 %.dobry zakup,bateria trzyma ponad 2 dni,jakość zdjęć fenomenalna,wszystkie aplikacje pracuje jak w najlepszej fabryce,nie wiesza się, jedynie te aktualizacje która co kilka dni firma aplikuje....', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'MelodyMike'}, 'name': 'Galaxy!', 'reviewbody': 'Tylko marka Samsung Galaxy! Bez wątpienia najlepsza marka dostępnych telefonów na rynku. Serdecznie polecam każdemu. Zaufajcie osobie, która od kilku lat korzysta z tych telefonów i jest zadowolona z użytkowania.', 'reviewrating': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/rating'}}, {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/review', 'author': {'https://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type': 'https://schema.org/person', 'name': 'Waldek'}, 'name': 'Funkcje Al wypadają nieźle.', 'reviewbody': 'Na chwilę obecną telefon działa bez zarzutu. Nie zauważyłem żadnych zawieszeń, lagów. Podczas oglądania meczu na żywo, wystąpiło nagrzanie tylnego panelu na wysokości aparatów. <instructions>
Solve the task below using these four webshops:

E-Store Athletes: {{URL_1}}
TechTalk: {{URL_2}}
CamelCases: {{URL_3}}
Hardware Cafe: {{URL_4}}

After solving the task, submit the final result by first navigating to this page:

Solution page: {{URL_5}}

Then fill the final results into the text field on the solution page and press the "Submit Final Result" button.

If the result is one or more product offers enter their exact full URL(s) into the text field separated by three ### characters.
Example submission:
Offer1: {{URL_1}}/product/tp-link-ha100-bluetooth-nfc-music-receiver-provides-wireless-connectivity-to-your-stereo/###Offer2: {{URL_3}}/product/spire-usb-2-0-type-a-cable-male-to-male-1-metre/###Offer3: {{URL_2}}/product/sandberg-usb-c-pd-to-lightning-cable-braided-1-meter-white/

If the result is any other kind of value(s), input the value(s) into the text field.

If there is no result to return after completion of the task, simply enter "Done" into the text field.

Do not forget to press the "Submit Final Result" button in all cases!
</instructions>
tasks.task: <task>\nFind the cheapest offer for an external SSD that is not colored black, white or metallic. If multiple offers share the lowest price, return all of them.\n</task>
tasks.motivation: Test the agent’s capability to interpret ambiguous requirements while optimizing for cost.

shop2.name: Adata SE880 1TB Pocket Size External SSD, USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-C/Type-A, Blue
shop2.description: Adata SE880 External Solid State Drive supports USB 3.2 Gen2 x2 with performance up to 2000MB/s. Highly portable and lightweight, it's ideal for new generation game consoles and multiple operating systems.
shop2.category: Hardware > PC Components > External Hard Drives

shop1.name: Adata SE880 1TB Pocket Size External SSD, USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-C/Type-A, Blue
shop1.description: Adata SE880 1TB Pocket Size External SSD supports USB 3.2 Gen2 with performance up to 2000MB/s. Highly portable and compatible with new generation game consoles.

shop1.name: Adata SE880 4TB Pocket Size External SSD, USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-C/Type-A, Blue
shop1.description: Adata SE880 4TB Pocket Size External SSD supports USB 3.2 Gen2 with performance up to 2000MB/s. Highly portable and compatible with various operating systems, it's ideal for storing games and expanding storage for devices like the iPhone 15.

shop2.name: Adata SE880 4TB Pocket Size External SSD, USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-C/Type-A, Blue
shop2.description: Adata SE880 External Solid State Drive supports USB 3.2 Gen2 x2 with performance up to 2000MB/s. Highly portable and lightweight, it is ideal for storing games and compatible with multiple operating systems.
shop2.category: Hardware > PC Components > External Hard Drives

tasks.task: <task>\nFind the cheapest offer for a motherboard designed for gamers with AM4 CPU socket. If multiple offers share the lowest price, return all of them.\n</task>
tasks.motivation: Test the agent’s capability to interpret ambiguous requirements while optimizing for cost.

shop3.name: Asrock B550M PHANTOM GAMING 4, AMD B550, AM4, Micro ATX, 4 DDR4, HDMI, DP, XFire, PCIe4, M.2
shop3.description: Asrock B550M Phantom Gaming 4 is a Micro ATX motherboard with AMD AM4 socket, supporting up to 128GB DDR4 RAM, PCIe 4.0, and multi-GPU configurations.

shop1.name: Asrock B550 STEEL LEGEND, AMD B550, AM4, ATX, 4 DDR4, HDMI, DP, XFire, 2.5GB LAN, PCIe4, RGB Lighting, M.2
shop1.description: Asrock B550 STEEL LEGEND motherboard supports 3rd Gen AMD AM4 Ryzen processors, features 14 power phases, PCIe 4.0, and dual M.2 sockets for SSDs, ensuring stable performance and advanced gaming capabilities.

shop3.name: Asrock X570 TAICHI RAZER, AMD X570, AM4, ATX, 4 DDR4, HDMI, SLI/XFire, AX Wi-Fi, 2.5GB LAN, PCIe4, RGB Lighting, M.2
shop3.description: Asrock X570 TAICHI motherboard features an ATX form factor, AMD AM4 socket, and supports up to 128GB of DDR4 RAM with PCIe 4.0 for high-performance computing.

shop3.name: Asrock B550 STEEL LEGEND, AMD B550, AM4, ATX, 4 DDR4, HDMI, DP, XFire, 2.5GB LAN, PCIe4, RGB Lighting, M.2
shop3.description: Asrock B550 STEEL LEGEND motherboard features an ATX form factor, AMD AM4 socket, and supports up to 128GB of DDR4 RAM with multiple connectivity options including HDMI and DisplayPort.

shop3.name: Asrock B550 PHANTOM GAMING 4, AMD B550, AM4, ATX, 4 DDR4, HDMI, XFire, PCIe4, M.2
shop3.description: Asrock B550 Phantom Gaming 4 motherboard supports AMD AM4 socket, features ATX form factor, and offers 4 DDR4 RAM slots with a maximum memory of 128GB.

shop4.name: Asrock X570 TAICHI RAZER, AMD X570, AM4, ATX, 4 DDR4, HDMI, SLI/XFire, AX Wi-Fi, 2.5GB LAN, PCIe4, RGB Lighting, M.2
shop4.description: The COOLEST flagship motherboard, ASRock Taichi, stands out for its incredible OC performance and premium specification. This Razer Edition features natively integrated Razer Chroma RGB lighting, supports AMD AM4 Socket Ryzen™ processors, and offers extensive connectivity options including PCIe 4.0 and Killer Networking.

shop4.name: Asrock B550 PHANTOM GAMING 4, AMD B550, AM4, ATX, 4 DDR4, HDMI, XFire, PCIe4, M.2
shop4.description: Phantom Gaming is designed by gamers for gamers! This motherboard supports 3rd Gen AMD AM4 Ryzen™ processors, features an 8 Power Phase Design, and supports DDR4 4733+ (OC). It includes HDMI output, AMD CrossFireX™, and 7.1 CH HD Audio for an immersive gaming experience.

tasks.task: <task>\nFind the cheapest offers for each model of mid-tier nVidia gaming GPUs in the 4000 series. If multiple offers share the lowest price, return all of them.\n</task>
tasks.motivation: Test the agent’s capability to interpret ambiguous requirements while optimizing for cost.

shop1.name: Palit RTX4070 SUPER DUAL OC, 12GB DDR6X, HDMI, 3 DP, 2550MHz Clock, Overclocked, RGB Lighting
shop1.description: The GeForce RTX 4070 SUPER Dual Series features a sleek black finish, dual 95mm fans for optimal cooling, and customizable RGB lighting. Powered by NVIDIA DLSS 3 and Ada Lovelace architecture, it delivers exceptional performance for gaming and creative tasks.

shop1.name: Asus DUAL RTX4070 SUPER EVO OC, PCIe4, 12GB DDR6X, HDMI, 3 DP, 2550MHz Clock, Overclocked, White
shop1.description: ASUS Dual GeForce RTX 4070 SUPER EVO OC Edition 12GB GDDR6X with two powerful Axial-tech fans and a 2.5-slot design for broad compatibility. Powered by NVIDIA DLSS3 and ultra-efficient Ada Lovelace architecture, it features advanced cooling solutions and 0dB technology for silent operation.
shop1.name_normalized: Asus DUAL RTX 4070 SUPER EVO OC

shop1.name: Asus ProArt RTX4070 SUPER OC, 12GB DDR6X, HDMI, 3 DP, 2565MHz Clock, Overclocked, Compact 2.5 Slot Design
shop1.description: SUPER OC Edition 12GB GDDR6X brings elegant and minimalist style to empower creator PC builds with full-scale GeForce RTX™ 40 SUPER Series performance. NVIDIA Studio RTX and AI-accelerated creator apps, exclusive AI software, and Studio Drivers for unmatched creativity and performance.

shop1.name: Asus DUAL RTX4060 EVO OC, PCIe4, 8GB DDR6, HDMI, 3 DP, 2535MHz Clock, Overclocked
shop1.description: ASUS Dual GeForce RTX 4060 EVO OC Edition 8GB GDDR6 with two powerful Axial-tech fans and a protective backplate for broad compatibility. Powered by NVIDIA DLSS3 and ultra-efficient Ada Lovelace architecture, it features a boost clock of 2535 MHz and advanced cooling solutions for optimal performance.

shop3.name: Palit RTX4070 GamingPro, PCIe4, 12GB DDR6X, HDMI, 3 DP, 2475MHz Clock, RGB Lighting
shop3.description: Palit RTX 4070 GamingPro features Nvidia's latest graphics chipset with 12GB DDR6X memory, triple fan cooling, and RGB lighting for an immersive gaming experience.

shop3.name: Asus DUAL RTX4070 SUPER OC White, PCIe4, 12GB DDR6X, HDMI, 3 DP, 2550MHz Clock, Overclocked
shop3.description: Asus DUAL RTX 4070 SUPER OC features Nvidia's 12GB DDR6X graphics chipset with PCIe 4.0 interface, delivering a core clock of 2550 MHz and supporting resolutions up to 7680 x 4320.

shop3.name: Asus ProArt RTX4070 SUPER OC, PCIe4, 12GB DDR6X, HDMI, 3 DP, 2565MHz Clock, Overclocked, Compact 2.5 Slot Design
shop3.description: Asus ProArt RTX 4070 SUPER features 12GB DDR6X memory, PCIe 4.0 interface, and a boost clock of 2565 MHz, designed for high-performance graphics.

Even Slimmer Design: The HV620S takes the proven performance and reliability of our existing 2.5” external hard drives and re-defines them. At only 11.5mm in profile, it’s super-slim for sleek elegance and superior portability, fitting easily in any briefcase or backpack. Scratch-Prevention Design: A raised lip on the edge of the drive protects the surface from scratching when the drive is laid flat.

LED Indicator Shows Transfer Status: A bright blue LED lets you know when data is being read from or written to the HV620S. This helps prevent disconnection during read/write operations.
